pages.text: Crafting rituals is an intricate business; Even if you have the correct $(item)Inscription Tools$(), you can't just slap runic inscriptions down any old how and expect things to happen. Luckily, the $(item)Ritual Diviner$() is here to help. $(br2)Hold [$(k:sneak)] and press [$(k:use)] or [$(k:attack)] while looking at empty air to cycle through the avaliable rituals in either direction.

simply tap [$(k:use)] while looking at a $(item)Master Ritual Stone$() to make the Diviner build the currently selected ritual out of any $(item)Ritual Stones$() you may be carrying. It's almost like magic!

The Ritual Diviner can break replaceable blocks (like tall grass, snow, etc), but not solid ones such as stone or dirt, so make sure the area is clear before you commence construction, or the $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/activation_crystals)Activation Crystal$() will be unable to do its job. $(br2)It's also worth noting that the base ritual diviner can only create some of the more basic rituals. If you want the most out of your diviner, you'll have to upgrade it with $(dusk)Dusk Inscription Tools$().
與元素銘文工具不同的是，儀式推測仗和儀式推測仗[薄暮]永遠不會用完。
基礎儀式推測仗需要四種$(item)元素銘文工具$()各一個來構建，因此需要一個 3 階$(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)血之祭壇$(/l)。$(br2)四種基本元素銘文工具可以在您的祭壇中消耗$(blood)1000LP$()製作，具體如下頁所述。儀式推測仗[薄暮]需要一個四階祭壇來製作兩個元素銘文工具:薄暮，一個消耗$(blood)2000LP$()。
您也可以使用這些工具手工刻寫符文，但這只能用於裝飾，因為它既慢又不准確。
